00001 #pragma once
00002 #define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN
00003 #include <windows.h>
00004 #include <process.h>
00005 
00006 namespace Halia
00007 {
00009 
00014       class Thread
00015       {
00016       public:
00018             Thread( bool autoexec = false )
00019             {
00020                   mRunning = true;
00021                   mActive = false;
00022 
00023                   mThread = (HANDLE)_beginthreadex( 0, 0, &_Execute, this, CREATE_SUSPENDED, 0 );
00024 
00025                   if( autoexec )
00026                         Resume( );
00027             };
00028 
00030             ~Thread( )
00031             {
00032                   if( mRunning || mActive )
00033                         printf( "Thread deleted prior to ending" );
00034 
00035                   CloseHandle( mThread );
00036             };
00037 
00039             void Resume( )
00040             {
00041                   if( mActive )
00042                         return;
00043                   mActive = true;
00044                   ResumeThread( mThread );
00045             };
00046 
00048             void Suspend( )
00049             {
00050                   if( !mActive )
00051                         return;
00052                   mActive = false;
00053                   SuspendThread( mThread );
00054             };
00055 
00057             void Terminate( )
00058             {
00059                   mRunning = false;
00060                   WaitForSingleObject( mThread, INFINITE );
00061             };
00062 
00064             inline bool IsRunning( ) const
00065             {
00066                   return mRunning;
00067             };
00068 
00069       private:
00071             virtual int Execute( )
00072             {
00073                   return 0;
00074             };
00075 
00077             static unsigned int __stdcall _Execute( void* a )
00078             {
00079                   return ((Thread*)a)->Execute( );
00080             };
00081 
00083             bool mRunning;
00084 
00086             bool mActive;
00087 
00089             HANDLE mThread;
00090       };
00091 };
